name: 加賀 - Kaga Azur Lane LORA. / 加賀 (アズールレーン)
description:
Third Lora Release, 加賀 - Kaga Azur Lane, Like Akagi i didn't see a Kaga Lora or much IA Art, so i created one again.

Put everything in Filter for seeing all images!

Trained on 190+ Images with Good quality, that i tried personally manually, I picked only the Best one. (SFW + And some NFSW)

5700 Steps in Total ÷2 = 2850 Steps.

AnimeFullFinalPruned Used when trained, After some analyzing per batch on many models 15epoch, Version 14 seems the best and the most Official.

Weight: Recommended: 0.6-1 - Best Result: 0.8-1 Works perfectly at 1.

Model used: AbyssOrangeMix2_hard, MechanixMix, Anime ScreenShot-Like, YesMix, Corneo's 7th Heaven mix, MeinaMix

Vae used: OrangeMix Mostly, Sometime Kl-f8-anime2.

But probably works with any Anime Model.

Also i tested it on Realistic model, he work too, Just emphasize white hair like this > ((White hair)).

He can do the base Default skin Pretty well, Other are not 100% precise but he can do it somewhat if you describe it good. (See examples images)

He can be Flexible too.

Default, Swimsuit, Blue Dress, And one of my favourite but inconsistent Kaga Dusk Vigil. (Perhaps other but i didn't tested) 0.8-1 Weight recommended.

Trigger words is in the prompt image examples.

Just the basic for really Activating Kaga Lora is KagaV4, but you need to describe a little bit for Best Result, like in the Image examples.

Negative Embedding used: EasyNegative, BadPrompt2.

Share you're image in Comments :).
